meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeremy Horowitz Missy Montemayor John Overholt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4119.

td.p: Jeremy Horowitz, a lawyer from Santa Monica, California
Missy Montemayor, a health insurance supervisor from King of Prussia, Pennsylvania
John Overholt, a librarian from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,200)

tr.td: CHINA TOWN
A FEW GOOD MEN
5 "EASY" PIECES
WOLF
THE SHINING
(Alex: And what links all of these together...)
JACK NICHOLSON

Missy
Jeremy
ART
BEATLES LYRICS
IRREGULARS
BROADCAST NEWS
LITTLE SHOP OF HORRORS
IF THEY MARRIED...
